# Drawing a sprite of sonic using fill polygon like the pikachu
# doesn't really test anything in particular I just thought it would be neat
INIT 800 800

FILL_POLYGON 0 0 799 0 799 799 0 799 (255, 255, 255, 255)

# Very light grey pixels (224,224,224,255)
FILL_POLYGON 320 213 338 213 338 196 354 196 354 213 372 213 372 230 337 230 337 301 320 301 (224,224,224,255)
